questions.question: Considering the overall text layout and font styles, what is the dominant textual characteristic visually presented on the product?

What kind of visual organizational aids are used to separate the ingredients from the allergen warnings?
In terms of visual density, how much textual information is shown on the product?

Does the background of the label provide any visible detail that enhances or contrasts with the text?
